sentence.text: For example, the cerebellar malformations observed in RIKEN 4930444A02 knockout epidermis development show similarities to a number of developmental disorders, such as Joubert, Meckel-Gruber, and Bardet-Biedl syndromes, which involve mutations in cilia-related genes.
This study illustrates the value of knockout epidermis development in identifying genetic factors involved in the development of congenital hydrocephalus.
